channel.title: Orphius - Mell O D (Symphonix)
channel.description:
I've been wanting to create a Symphonic sounding track. I wasn't expecting it to be this time, but when I chose the new Orchestral demo for my sounds the track took on a mind of it's own. It's different than what is currently produced by Auxy users. It's not perfect, but I hope you like it.
https://soundcloud.com/musicalmysterytour/orphius

item.title: Orphius - Mell O D (Symphonix)
item.dc:creator: Mellowdee
item.description:
I tried adding more percussion, but I couldn’t get it to blend.

Read full topic

item.title: Orphius - Mell O D (Symphonix)
item.dc:creator: paxman
item.description:
This is a lot different from 99% of the stuff on Auxy. I could even imagine you adding some more orchestral percussion. Keep up the good work, man!

Read full topic
